summary.span: Specifies the appearance of a

span.span: Specifies the appearance of a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定设置，如颜色、 宽度、 透明度和触笔笔尖的形状。Use the property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a . 使用属性来指定添加到的笔画的绘制特性。Use the property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an . 之后添加的唯一笔画进行更改显示的已更新的属性。Only strokes that are added after the undergo change show the updated attributes. 已有的笔画的外观不会更改。The appearance of the strokes that are already on the does not change. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此类。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用两个对象来模拟在同一个使用笔和荧光笔。The following example demonstrates how to use two objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same . 该示例假定 XAML 文件中的根元素是调用`root`。The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a called `root`. 它还假定，没有称为`switchHighlighter`并且事件连接到此示例中定义的事件处理程序。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可添加到自定义属性对象。The method enables you to add custom properties to a object. 呈现自己的笔画并且想要提供的额外信息时，这很有用。This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加和检索自定义属性从对象。The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the object. 该示例将添加一个属性，指示是否对象是笔或荧光笔。The example adds a property that indicates whether the object is a pen or a highlighter. 中的代码`ChangeColors_Click`事件处理程序上呈现笔画的新颜色使用对象， `inkDA`。The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the that use the object, `inkDA`. 此示例假定有名为`inkCanvas1`，并且有两个对象名为`inkDA`，和 `highlighterDA.`This example assumes that there is an named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.` [!code-csharp[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素影响的高度和宽度呈现时，但不是值的属性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 应用到触笔的压力量时绘制。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果您设置属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序具有称为`inkCanvas1`，并将两个对象调用`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: is .

span.para: 重写时派生类中调用基类以确保注册的委托接收事件的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, call the method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素影响的高度和宽度呈现时，但不是值的属性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 应用到触笔的压力量时绘制。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果您设置属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序具有称为`inkCanvas1`，并将两个对象调用`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview.
